content: I think my favorite part is the actual making and experimenting part. I love getting my hands dirty and trying out new techniques, even if they don't always work out as planned. It's exciting to see how different materials and mediums interact with each other, and I often stumble upon happy accidents that lead to new ideas. Plus, it's just so satisfying to see a project come together, even if it's not exactly what I envisioned at the start.
